sentence.Network_en: She meticulously cleaned the gun and locked it away in its case.
sentence.Network_cn: 她小心翼翼地把枪擦拭干净，放进枪盒里锁好。

sentence.Network_en: Each week she meticulously entered in her notebooks all sums received.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个星期她都细心地在笔记本上记下所有收到的款项。

sentence.Network_en: The flat had been meticulously cleaned.
sentence.Network_cn: 公寓被仔仔细细地打扫过了。

entry.tran: 小心谨慎的;一丝不苟的;注意细节的
entry.def: If you describe someone as meticulous, you mean that they do things very carefully and with great attention to detail.

example.ex: He was so meticulous about everything...
example.tran: 他对所有事情都一丝不苟。

example.ex: The painting had been executed with meticulous attention to detail.
example.tran: 画这幅画的时候，画家非常注意细节。
